text: Berefrine (INN, USAN), also known as burefrine, is a sympathomimetic and mydriatic agent that was never marketed. It is an oxazolidine prodrug of phenylephrine, and hence, an α1-adrenergic receptor agonist. ==References== Category:Alpha-adrenergic agonists Category:Prodrugs Category:Sympathomimetics Category:Tert-butyl compounds
title: Berefrine
